oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Carl Smith CD project reference
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Live recordings from the Grand Ole Opry pulled and compiled as a reference recording from the CMF transcription collection for possible use in a Carl Smith commercially released project. Project remains unreleased as of 2016. Specific dates for each recording not noted.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carl Smith;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Introductions by Red Foley -- Let Old Mother Nature Have Her Way -- Mister Moon -- Let Old Mother Nature Have Her Way -- A Little Girl In My Hometown -- Our Honeymoon -- Sing Her A Love Song -- Introduction by Grant Turner - Hey Joe - Amazing Grace -- Dog-Gone It, Baby, I'm In Love -- How About You -- Darling,Am I The One -- Dog-Gone It, Baby, I'm In Love -- We Shall Meet Someday -- Loose Talk -- Amazing Grace -- More Than Anything Else In The World -- More Than Anything Else In The World -- Kisses Don't Lie -- Kisses Don't Lie
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
